question: The chart displays the number of working days lost over several years due to industrial actions. Based on this data, which of the following conclusions can be made?

options.A: The number of working days lost in 2011-12 is nearly 16 times the number lost in 2006-07.
options.B: The number of working days lost in 2007-08 is the highest among all the years shown.
options.C: The number of working days lost in 2006-07 is the lowest among all the years shown.
options.D: The number of working days lost in 2008-09 is more than in 2009-10.

explanation: The chart shows the number of working days lost in 2006-07 (88,000) is the lowest compared to other years. Due to dual encoding, the area of the bar is exaggerated, making it appears like 2011-12 is more than 16 times the number lost in 2006-07.
